definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
show one's ferocious appearance (idiom); the atrocious features revealed/with fangs bared

sentences.english: The dog was angry and bellicosely bristled up.
sentences.chinese: 狗發怒，毛髮倒豎，顯出一副好鬥的兇相。

sentences.english: The bos'n's mate was a heavy man, bald, with a scarred and brutal face.
sentences.chinese: 這個水手長助手是個禿頂，面帶傷疤和兇相的大力士。

sentences.english: He pretends to be very tough, but he's a kind man at bottom.
sentences.chinese: 他裝出一副兇相，實際上是個好心腸的人。
